meanings.sent1: The crocketed spire of the church gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The old castle had crocketed towers that added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent3: The crocketed edges of the cake made it look like a fancy crown.
meanings.sent4: Her crocketed scarf fluttered in the wind like delicate wings.
meanings.sent5: The crocketed design on the dress was so intricate, it mesmerized everyone.

meanings.sent1: The crocketed archway framed the entrance beautifully.
meanings.sent2: The crocketed pillars stood tall and proud in the courtyard.
meanings.sent3: The crocketed fence seemed to be waving hello to all who passed by.
meanings.sent4: His crocketed hat made him look like a character from a fairy tale.
meanings.sent5: The crocketed patterns on the rug added a cozy charm to the room.

meanings.sent1: The crocketed altar was the centerpiece of the cathedral.
meanings.sent2: The crocketed windows cast beautiful patterns of light inside.
meanings.sent3: The crocketed frame of the mirror reflected a distorted funhouse image.
meanings.sent4: The crocketed crown sparkled with embedded jewels.
meanings.sent5: The crocketed design on the vase gave it a regal appearance.
